section.name: Who is it?
section.p: Cyclops Group is a group of talented people trying to make their contribution to the java open source world.
Mailing list is coming soon. Today if you want to share ideas, feel free to send email to cyclopsgroup@gmail.com .

section.name: How to work
section.p:
After the code is checked out, the maven goals are still not ready to use. Because all project POM files extend one base POM. To retrieve this POM, please install maven-cyclops-plugin and do maven cyclops:deploy-pom.
$>maven plugin:download __ __ | \/ |__ _Apache__ ___ | |\/| / _` \ V / -_) ' \ ~ intelligent projects ~ |_| |_\__,_|\_/\___|_||_| v. 1.0.2
What is the artifactId of the plugin to download (e.g. maven-java-plugin)? maven-cyclops-plugin
What is the groupId of the plugin to download? [maven] com.cyclopsgroup What is the version of the plugin to download? 1.0-b3 build:start:
plugin:download-artifact: ......
$>cd ~ $>maven cyclops:deploy-pom ......
